thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com
thread.title: Charles

author: Charles
title: Charles
text: I've been buying here for several years now, and expect to continue in the future. We're talking old-time flavors, and hard to replace memories. Just not likely to encounter the like of these tasty tidbits north of the old Mason Dixon line. Born in New York state but travelled extensively through out the south on business and vacation, and developed a liking for the local cuisine. Just glad to have the Burger's Smokehouse there to provide what is not commonly available in this area.
